attributes.action: Stop Asset stripping of fully paid  elderly tax payers in their hrs of need
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: to stop People who have paid taxes all their lives being robbed of their life savings to pay for care when those who have done nothing all their lives get it all for free,and reap exactly the same benefits,

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
